abstract: Protesters march in Kabul, Afghanistan, demanding government prosecute those responsible for deadly beating of female religious scholar named Farkhunda; mob of men viciously attacked woman over false allegations she burned a Quran; assault was captured by cellphones and authorities have arrested 18 people.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds marched Monday in Kabul, the Afghan capital, demanding justice for a woman beaten to death on Thursday by a mob over false allegations she had burned a Quran.

headline.main: Afghanistan: Justice Sought for Woman Killed by Mob
headline.print_headline: Asia; Afghanistan: Justice Sought for Woman Killed by Mob

snippet: Hundreds marched Monday in Kabul, the Afghan capital, demanding justice for a woman beaten to death on Thursday by a mob over false allegations she had burned a Quran.
